summary_of_the_change: The initial contract term was extended from twenty-four (24) months to thirty-six (36) months (Sec. 2.1).
The notice period for termination for cause was increased from 15 days to 30 days (Sec. 2.2).
The notice period for termination for convenience was increased from 60 days to 90 days (Sec. 2.3).
The fixed monthly compensation rate was increased from 15000 USD to 18000 USD (Sec. 3.1).
The interest rate on late payments was increased from 1.5% per month to 2.0% per month (Sec. 3.2).
The liability cap was changed from three (3) months to six (6) months of fees paid (Sec. 6.2).
